data.name: Asteroid - Expansion Pass
data.detailed_description:
Enrich your gaming experience with the Asteroid - Expansion Pass!


The Asteroid Expansion Pass will be available for purchase starting 08/26/2022.

To access additional content, you must own Asteroid for Steam.
Content packs are not available for purchase separately.
The additional contents will be usable only after their release.
Additional content not listed below may be distributed with the Expansion Pass.

The Expansion Pass contains:
- x1 Expansion Pass exclusive ship style
- x990 Aquanium Gems
- x1000 Flact

Coming in 2023

- New exclusive content and planets!

data.short_description: Enrich your gaming experience with the Asteroid Expansion Pass!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Italian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64-bit)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 650M or similar
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64-bit)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or similar
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Intel Macs, Rosetta on Apple silicon Macs
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Intel Macs, Rosetta on Apple silicon Macs
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux (64-bit)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux (64-bit)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
